item.title: Flux with Kind and Soft Serve
item.description: Originally post to hackmd.io This article covers getting a local Kind cluster setup with Flux and the self hosted git server Soft Serve. Requirements You will need to have the following installed: docker installation kubectl installation kustomize installation flux installation kind installation soft installation Assumptions I am assuming the following things: Running on Linux Familiar with: Docker YAML Git Kind kubectl Let’s get Started We need to run two copies of Soft Serve in order to be able to access and configure the software.
